channel.title: Why isn't this executing?

item.title: Why isn't this executing?
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

So I am adding code’s to my hyperion server. But, the thing i added didn’t execute. In other words it doesn’t say “hey.” Here’s the code:
public static void runecraftPouches(Player player, int itemID) {
if (player.getInventory().contains(5509)) { // small pouch
//if (player.getInventory().contains(1436)) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“hey”);
//return true; will use for boolean
}
//return false; will use for boolean
}

Thanks.

Read full topic
